revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Banana Pi BPI R2.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Development Board |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.banana-pi.org/r2.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Banana_Pi_BPI_R2 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Banana Pi |model = BPI R |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 2 |revision = (v1.2) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/07/2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Banana_Pi_BPI_R2 |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer, wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7623N;FBGA485; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 1.3 GHz <!-- 1.3 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC, microSD |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1WEPD-B031; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = SST;25VF512A; |flash2size = 512 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ4G83AFR-PBC; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = MediaTek;MT7530WU; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Bananian;;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATA 3.0, MicroSD |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 3-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.1 BLE, HDMI out, MIPI DSI, MicroSD Card slot, IR receiver, GPIO, SPI, I2C, |addchip = PMIC;MediaTek;MT6323L;;1; ,,, Power Distribution Switch (USB 3.0);TI;TPS2553;;1; ,,, Sink/Source DDR Termination Regulator;TI;TPS51200;;1; ,,, PCIe 2.0 to SATA 6Gbps Controller;Asmedia;ASM1061;;1;,,, 18V, 5A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;;2;,,, 2-Bit 20 Mb/s Dual-Supply Level Translator; ON Semi;NLSX4373;;1;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;ANPEC;APL5932A;;3;,,, 18V, 5.5A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SinoVoIP |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android, Ubuntu, Debian, OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2017 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B078HG62ZT |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT6625L; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== :'''Banana Pi RPI R2 Board''' *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7623N Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A7 @1.3GHz *Memory: 2GB DDR3 (shared with GPU); GPU: Mali-450 MP4 *Storage: MicroSD (TF) Card, SATA 6Gbps, eMMC *Network: 5x 10/100/1000Mbps Ethernet (MT7530) *WLAN: 802.11abgn 2.4/5GHz (MT6625L), BT 4.1 BLE *Video In: CSI input for video cameras, Out: HDMI *Audio In: I2S; Audio Out: HDMI, I2S audio *USB Ports: 2x USB 3.0 host, 1x USB 2.0 OTG *GPIO: 40-pins header, 28x GPIO, UART,I2C,SPI,PWM,I2S *Buttons: Reset button, Power button, U-Boot button *LED: Red, Green, Blue *OS: Android, Ubuntu, Debian, Bananian *Power Source: 12V/2A via DC power *Dimensions: 148mm × 100mm *Weight: 100g
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Banana_Pi ''Banana Pi'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_BPI-R2 ''Banana Pi BPI-R2'' on '''Banana Pi''' Wiki]
===News=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/01/03/banana-pi-bpi-r2-router-board-powered-by-MediaTek-mt7623a-quad-core-processor-comes-with-5-gbe-ports-sata-and-more/ ''Banana Pi BPI-R2 Board Powered by MediaTek MT7623A'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/07/27/banana-pi-bpi-r64-router-board-is-powered-by-MediaTek-mt7622-supports-802-11ac-wifi-poe/ ''Banana Pi BPI-R64 Board is Powered by MediaTek MT7622'' on '''CNX-Software''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/sinovoip/sinovoip_banana_pi_r2 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/sinovoip/banana_pi_r2 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = mediatek |subtarget = mt7623 |arch = arm_cortex-a7_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.0 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/wifi_2.4ghz WiFi 2.4GHz], Bluetooth |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
